translation.en: This is a world like no other,
translation.fr: Ce monde n'est pas comme les autres.

translation.en: one brimming with mystery and teeming with danger,
translation.fr: Il regorge de mystères et de dangers.

translation.en: filled with hundreds of islands strewn across vast seas.
translation.fr: Des centaines d'iles ponctuent ses vastes mers.

translation.en: And throughout these seas are those who live according to their own rules,
translation.fr: Et sur ces mers naviguent ceux qui ne vivent que par leur propre code,

translation.en: who seek a life of freedom and adventure.
translation.fr: à la recherche d'aventure et de liberté.

translation.en: This is a world of pirates!
translation.fr: Ce monde est un monde de pirates.

translation.en: Piracy is a scourge upon this world.
For too long, villains and miscreants have sown havoc across our seas.
translation.fr: Les forbans sèment le chaos et la destruction sur nos mers. LOGUE TOWN, 22 ANS PLUS TÔT

translation.en: But the Marines, on behalf of your World Government,
translation.fr: Mais la Marine, au nom du Gouvernement Mondial,

translation.en: strive to keep you safe and protected.
translation.fr: s'efforce de vous protéger, vous et vos familles.

translation.en: And today we've made a great stride in that effort.
translation.fr: Ce jour est à marquer d'une pierre blanche.

translation.en: Gold Roger,
the so- called King of the Pirates,
has been captured.
His reign of terror ends this day.
translation.fr: Son règne de terreur se termine aujourd'hui.

translation.en: Peace shall be restored.
translation.fr: La paix peut enfin être rétablie.

translation.en: Let this be a message to break the spirit of anyone foolish enough
translation.fr: Que ce moment résonne comme un avertissement pour ceux qui chercheraient à suivre son exemple.

translation.en: to follow in his footsteps.
translation.fr: pour ceux qui chercheraient à suivre son exemple.

translation.en: you have been sentenced to death
translation.fr: tu as été condamné à mort

translation.en: for the crimes of piracy,
thievery,
and conspiracy against the World Government.
translation.fr: et complot contre le Gouvernement Mondial.

translation.en: - Do you have any last words? - Yeah.
translation.fr: - Tu veux dire quelque chose ? - Ouais.

translation.en: Would you take these off? Starting to itch.
translation.fr: Tu peux me retirer ce machin ? Ça me gratte.

translation.en: I warned you.
You brought this upon yourself.
translation.fr: Tu n'as que ce que tu mérites.

translation.en: That I did, Vice- Admiral.
Now I'm bringing it to one and all.
translation.fr: Mais ça en valait la peine.

translation.en: By the authority of the World Government…
I declare your life
forfeit--
Pirate King, where is your treasure?
translation.fr: Roi des pirates, où est ton trésor ?

translation.en: - Tell us where you hid it! -
You want to know where my treasure is?
translation.fr: Vous voulez savoir où je l'ai caché ?

translation.en: I'll tell you.
Wealth.
Fame.
Power.
I found everything this world has to offer.
Free yourselves.
Take to the seas!
My treasure is yours to find.
Gold Roger's final words changed the world forever.
translation.fr: Les dernières paroles de Gold Roger changèrent le monde à jamais.

translation.en: A new age was born,
the Great Pirate Era,
setting off a race across the seas to find the Pirate King's hidden treasure,
translation.fr: Précipitant les hommes sur les mers à la recherche de ce trésor.

translation.en: the One Piece.
Ever since I was a kid,
Shanks would tell me stories about pirates and their adventures.
translation.fr: Shanks m'a raconté des tonnes d'histoires de pirates.

translation.en: So, yeah, the sea's been calling.
translation.fr: Donc, oui, je me suis jeté à l'eau.

translation.en: Well, not exactly calling, because I pretty much can't swim,
translation.fr: Enfin, façon de parler. Je nage comme une enclume.

translation.en: but you get the idea.
I'm setting out to follow my dream,
translation.fr: J'ai décidé de poursuivre mon rêve.

translation.en: to find the One Piece
and become King of the Pirates!
translation.fr: et je deviendrai le roi des pirates !

translation.en: All I need is a loyal crew.
I think about ten men should do.
Well, ten men and a bird.
translation.fr: OK. Dix hommes et un oiseau.

translation.en: It's not gonna be easy. The ocean is… is pretty big
translation.fr: Ça va pas être facile. L'océan est plutôt vaste.

translation.en: and kind of dangerous.
So what do you say?
Are you with me?
Mutiny.
Oh man.
It's my first day.
Load your cannons!
Fire!
Fire!
Take everything!
But leave the crew to me.
translation.fr: Mais laissez-moi l'équipage. Je veux les voir trembler de terreur.

translation.en: Let's show 'em what true terror looks like.
translation.fr: Mais laissez-moi l'équipage. Je veux les voir trembler de terreur. Bien !

translation.en: Where is the pirate hunter Roronoa Zoro?
translation.fr: Où est Roronoa Zoro, le chasseur de pirates ?

translation.en: Don't deny he was on your ship.
He booked passage to Sixis Island. After that, I don't know.
translation.fr: Il a débarqué à Sixis. Après ça, je sais pas.

translation.en: Liar! I know Zoro must be after me. Who else is worthy of his pursuit?
translation.fr: Menteur ! Après quel autre pirate Zoro aurait-il pu en avoir ?

translation.en: He had a list of pirates and their bounties.
translation.fr: Il avait une liste de primes.

translation.en: And of course, I was at the top.
translation.fr: Et mon nom était le premier.

translation.en: Actually, your name wasn't on it.
translation.fr: À vrai dire, il n'y figurait pas.

translation.en: No! No!
- Koby, clean up this mess. - Coming, Captain Alvida!
translation.fr: - Kobby, nettoie ça ! - Bien, capitaine Alvida !

translation.en: Who's the most powerful pirate on the seas?
translation.fr: Qui est la plus grande pirate de toutes les mers ?

translation.en: - Alvida! - Captain Alvida!
Who's there?
Knock it off!
Please don't kill me.
Hey, hey, hey. I'm not gonna kill you, all right?
translation.fr: Je vais pas te tuer, OK ?

translation.en: I just need you to be quiet.
translation.fr: J'ai juste besoin que tu arrêtes de crier.

translation.en: First things first.
- Do you have any food here? - What?
I'm starving.
Alvida doesn't let me eat until after she finishes her meal.
- Who's Alvida? - This is her ship.
translation.fr: - Qui ça ? - Tu es sur son bateau.

translation.en: - She's captain of the Alvida Pirates. - Oh, that's great!
- It is? - Yeah!
'Cause I'm a pirate too.
translation.fr: Moi aussi, je suis un pirate.

translation.en: You don't look like a pirate.
- What do they look like? - Pirates are scum.
translation.fr: - De quoi j'ai l'air ? - Pas d'un pirate.

translation.en: They're thieves and murderers.
Not the pirates I know.
Shanks. He's back!
Work fast as the breeze, men!
Captain wants this haul to the traders by nightfall.
translation.fr: Shanks veut le butin à terre avant ce soir.

translation.en: Before those Marine bastards get back on our trail.
translation.fr: Avant que la Marine nous retrouve.

translation.en: Easy with this, Roux. It's worth more than the rest of the loot put together.
translation.fr: Tout doux, Roo. Ce truc vaut une petite fortune.

translation.en: Aye, captain.
Pretend it's a leg of lamb. You wouldn't drop that.
translation.fr: Imagine que c'est un gigot. Ça, tu le ferais pas tomber.

translation.en: - Here. - Got it, Captain.
Luffy! I was wondering when you'd pop up.
Our favorite street urchin comes to welcome us back.
translation.fr: Notre oursin préféré est venu nous accueillir.

translation.en: How ya been, kid?
translation.fr: - Ça va, petit ? - Je suis pas un oursin !

translation.en: I'm not an urchin. I'm a pirate!
translation.fr: - Ça va, petit ? - Je suis pas un oursin ! Je suis un pirate !

translation.en: I'm not joking. I'm ready to join your crew.
translation.fr: Je suis sérieux, je veux venir avec vous.

translation.en: The sea isn't a child's game.
translation.fr: L'océan est dangereux. Il est pas pour les enfants.

translation.en: It's dangerous. The scars on my face are proof of that.
translation.fr: L'océan est dangereux. Il est pas pour les enfants. Regarde mes cicatrices.

translation.en: I can do it, Shanks. I swear.
translation.fr: Je suis prêt, Shanks. Je te le jure.

translation.en: You're not ready. I am. And I'll show you!
translation.fr: - Tu l'es pas. - Si ! Et je vais te le prouver.

translation.en: Might want to take it easy on him, Captain. He's got no family to speak of. The kid's on his own.
translation.fr: Soyez pas trop dur avec lui. Il a plus de famille.

translation.en: Better a disappointed kid now than a dead one later.
translation.fr: Je préfère qu'il soit déçu plutôt que mort.

translation.en: Let's get this done.
- These men need a drink. - Aye, Captain.
translation.fr: - Ces hommes ont besoin de boire. - Bien.

translation.en: - And a bath. - Hey, Shanks!
Put it down, Luffy. Before you hurt yourself.
translation.fr: Arrête, Luffy. Tu vas te faire mal.

translation.en: I'm not afraid of getting hurt. And I'll prove it to you.
translation.fr: Je suis pas une poule mouillée, et je vais le prouver !

translation.en: I don't get it. Why would anyone want to be a pirate?
translation.fr: Je ne comprends pas. Pourquoi vouloir devenir pirate ?

translation.en: 'Cause it's the best thing there is.
You have the… the wind in your back,
translation.fr: T'as la bise dans le dos,

translation.en: the salty sea air,
your loyal crew by your side.
You never know what's on the horizon.
translation.fr: Tu vis un jour après l'autre.

translation.en: It's all about being… free.
Nothing's free about Alvida's crew.
translation.fr: Personne n'est libre sur ce bateau.

translation.en: She tells me when to eat, when to sleep.
translation.fr: Alvida nous dit quand manger, quand dormir.

translation.en: I even have to paint her toenails.
translation.fr: Elle me fait même vernir ses orteils.

translation.en: - So why don't you just leave? - No one leaves Alvida!
translation.fr: - Pourquoi tu pars pas ? - Je peux pas !

translation.en: She'll never let me go.
You should never let anyone tell you what you can't do.
If I did that, I never would've left my village to go find the One Piece.
translation.fr: Si j'avais fait ça, je serais jamais parti à la recherche du One Piece.

translation.en: Gold Roger's treasure?
That's impossible. Every pirate in the world is after that.
translation.fr: Tu ne le trouveras jamais. Tous les pirates le cherchent.

translation.en: Why shouldn't I be the one to find it?
As soon as I'm out of here, I'm on my way to the Grand Line.
translation.fr: Après ce navire, mon objectif est Grand Line.

translation.en: Pirate graveyard.
There are a- hundred- foot waves and sea beasts that'll crush your bones.
translation.fr: Le royaume des vagues et des monstres gigantesques ?

translation.en: Once you enter the Grand Line, you never return.
translation.fr: Ceux qui s'y aventurent n'en reviennent jamais.

translation.en: It sounds kind of fun.
Wait!
Is… is that… is that one of the sea beasts?
It's just Alvida snoring.
If you want to get out of here, it's now or never.
translation.fr: Si tu veux t'éclipser, c'est le moment.

translation.en: Lifeboats are tied at the stern of the ship.
translation.fr: Les canots sont à la poupe.

translation.en: - Gonna need one of these. - Head due north.
translation.fr: - Ça pourrait servir. - Va au nord.

translation.en: - You should hit land in a few days. - North. Which way is north?
translation.fr: - Il y a une ile à quelques jours. - C'est de quel côté, le nord ?

translation.en: What the hell is going on up there?
- What's the meaning of this? - Alvida, I can explain.
translation.fr: - Qui c'est ? - Je peux tout expliquer.

translation.en: You dare betray me to a bounty hunter?
translation.fr: Tu m'as vendue à un chasseur de primes ?

translation.en: No, that's not it at all.
And you, you're too scrawny to be Roronoa Zoro.
translation.fr: Et toi, t'es trop frêle pour être Roronoa Zoro.

translation.en: I'm Monkey D. Luffy.
Never heard of you.
Well, remember the name, 'cause I'm gonna be King of the Pirates.
translation.fr: Dans ce cas, m'oublie pas, je vais devenir le roi des pirates.

translation.en: You must be new around here, boy,
translation.fr: Tu dois être nouveau, le clou.

translation.en: because who is the most powerful pirate on the seas?
translation.fr: Qui est la plus grande pirate de toutes les mers ?

translation.en: - Captain Alvida! - Captain Alvida!
translation.fr: - La capitaine Alvida ! - La capitaine Alvida !

translation.en: I'm sorry. I didn't hear you, Koby.
Who's the most powerful pirate on the seas?
translation.fr: Qui est la plus grande pirate ?

translation.en: - Answer me, you sniveling runt. - He doesn't have to.
translation.fr: Réponds-moi, bon à rien. Il est pas obligé. Kobby fait ce qu'il veut.

translation.en: Koby's his own man.
translation.fr: Il est pas obligé. Kobby fait ce qu'il veut.

translation.en: - Shut up. - No. No, he's not.
He's mine, and he'll always be mine.
translation.fr: Il m'appartient. Et il me quittera jamais.

translation.en: That's not what he told me.
translation.fr: C'est pas ce qu'il m'a dit.

translation.en: He said that you were mean.
translation.fr: Il m'a dit que t'étais bête.

translation.en: - - And cruel.
And that you're as dumb as a sea cow. No, Captain Alvida! I didn't!
translation.fr: - Et que t'étais un gros cachalot. - Non, il ment !

translation.en: What kind of a monster are you? The stretchy kind.
translation.fr: - Quel genre de monstre es-tu ? - Le genre élastique.

translation.en: You! This is all your fault!
translation.fr: Kobby ! Tout ça est ta faute !

translation.en: That's enough.
Pistol!
Anyone else got a problem with Koby?
translation.fr: Vous avez un problème avec Kobby ?

translation.en: No, sir.
Come on.
We're gonna need a boat and enough food for a few days.
translation.fr: On va avoir besoin d'un canot et de vivres.

translation.en: - Me? - Yeah!
You're coming with me, right?
You can come out.
People often visit shrines to light candles for those they've lost.
translation.fr: Ces bougies sont normalement allumées en l'honneur des morts.

translation.en: Who are yours for?
This one is for someone I knew a long time ago.
translation.fr: Celle-ci est pour une amie qui m'était chère.

translation.en: And the other?
You've been following me for three days.
translation.fr: Tu me suis depuis trois jours.

translation.en: - What do you want? - You may call me Mr. 7.
I represent an organization known as Baroque Works.
translation.fr: Je représente Baroque Works, une organisation secrète.

translation.en: We are interested in your unique set of skills, pirate hunter Roronoa Zoro.
translation.fr: Tes talents nous intéressent au plus haut point, Roronoa Zoro.

translation.en: What are you? Some band of assassins?
translation.fr: Vous êtes quoi, une bande d'assassins ?

translation.en: We are much, much more.
You should know it's a high honor to be asked to join our ranks.
translation.fr: Être invité à rejoindre nos rangs est un rare honneur.

translation.en: Kind of got my own thing going on.
Membership would make you even more invincible, more feared.
translation.fr: Si tu nous rejoignais, tu deviendrais intouchable. Plus craint.

translation.en: Does it come with a free face tattoo?
My favorite is Number 1.
To turn down Baroque Works
is to forfeit your life.
If they were that serious,
they should've sent someone better than Number 7.
translation.fr: vous auriez dû envoyer quelqu'un de mieux classé.

translation.en: That look on Alvida's face. I've never seen anyone stand up to her before.
translation.fr: Je n'avais jamais vu quelqu'un tenir tête à Alvida.

translation.en: - Shouldn't have messed with you. - How did you stretch like that?
translation.fr: - Elle l'a cherché. - Pourquoi tu es élastique ?

translation.en: It's kind of a long story.
At least you didn't get your eye. I was aiming for it, but I missed.
translation.fr: - Au moins, t'as encore ton œil. - C'est parce que j'ai ripé.

translation.en: - I thought you said you were tough. - I am!
translation.fr: - Tu vois que t'es pas prêt. - Je le suis !

translation.en: Don't stitch it too good. I want everyone to see my scar.
translation.fr: Serre pas trop les points. Je veux que ça laisse une cicatrice.

translation.en: Scars don't make the man, Luffy.
translation.fr: La cicatrice ne fait pas l'homme.

translation.en: It's the lesson behind the scar, and you didn't earn this one.
translation.fr: C'est ce qu'il en retient. Et celle-là, tu l'as pas méritée.

translation.en: Then let me earn it. I'll be the best pirate ever.
translation.fr: Alors, laisse-moi la mériter. Je ferai un super pirate.

translation.en: Look, I've been practicing what my face is gonna look like on my wanted poster.
translation.fr: Regarde. Je sais déjà à quoi je vais ressembler sur mon avis de recherche.

translation.en: I've no doubt your mug will be on a wanted poster one day.
translation.fr: Ta bobine finira bien sur un avis de recherche.

translation.en: But you're not ready. My ship already has an anchor.
translation.fr: Mais t'es pas prêt. Et on a déjà une ancre.

translation.en: I'm not an anchor.
Stupid Shanks.
Stupid treasure.
There you go, Captain.
Bring us your best whiskey.
I'm afraid we're out.
That'd be our fault, friend. We've, uh, been doing some celebrating.
translation.fr: C'est notre faute. On avait quelque chose à fêter.

translation.en: We've drunk the place dry, but…
translation.fr: On a rincé la réserve, mais…

translation.en: perhaps this will make up for it.
What can we do with one bottle? Generally, you drink it.
translation.fr: - On va faire quoi, d'une bouteille ? - Buvez-la.

translation.en: Now there's glass everywhere.
Makino, got a mop?
Since you like cleaning so much.
translation.fr: Vu que t'aimes faire le ménage.

translation.en: Come on, men. Let's find a real bar.
translation.fr: Venez. On va se trouver un vrai bar.

translation.en: - He got you good, huh, Cap'n? - You got a mop?
Why are you laughing?
How could you let him insult you like that?
All he did was spill a drink on me.
But you should've fought back! Why didn't you kick his ass?
translation.fr: T'aurais dû te battre ! Pourquoi tu lui as pas fait sa fête ?

translation.en: Not everything can be solved with violence.
translation.fr: La violence ne résout pas tout.

translation.en: A man needs to be strong, but he also needs to be good.
translation.fr: Un homme doit être fort, mais il doit aussi être bon.

translation.en: You're not a real man.
You're nothing but a coward.
You see?
I told you, you weren't ready. - - Wait.
translation.fr: Je savais que t'étais pas prêt. Luffy, attends.

translation.en: What have you done?
You ate a Devil Fruit? I didn't know any better.
translation.fr: - Tu as mangé un Fruit du démon ? - Je savais pas ce que c'était.

translation.en: But mine was a Gum Gum Fruit. It turned my body into rubber.
translation.fr: Le Fruit du Gum Gum. Il a rendu mon corps élastique.

translation.en: So now what?
translation.fr: Et maintenant ? Où est-ce qu'on va aller ?

translation.en: - We have to be going somewhere, right? - We are going somewhere.
translation.fr: Et maintenant ? Où est-ce qu'on va aller ? On va déjà quelque part.

translation.en: Next stop,
to the Grand Line!
Do you know how to get there?
You can't navigate. You don't even have a map!
translation.fr: Tu n'en sais rien. Tu n'as même pas de carte !

translation.en: Good point.
We should probably pick one up.
Maybe I've made a mistake. I never should've left Alvida.
translation.fr: J'ai commis une erreur monumentale. J'aurais dû rester avec Alvida.

translation.en: Koby, if you could do anything in the world right now,
translation.fr: Kobby, si tu pouvais faire ce que tu voulais,

translation.en: what would it be?
I guess there is one thing, but…
it's dumb.
- What was that for? - You being dumb.
translation.fr: - Pourquoi tu m'as giflé ? - Tu faisais l'imbécile.

translation.en: Now spit it out.
I've kind of…
I've always wanted to be…
a Marine.
Ever since I was a kid,
I wanted to protect people that can't protect themselves.
translation.fr: J'ai toujours voulu protéger les plus faibles.

translation.en: I told you it was dumb.
If that's what you want,
translation.fr: Si c'est ce que tu veux,

translation.en: I think you should do it.
I'll help you out.
You don't even know me. We shared a meal, Koby.
translation.fr: - Tu ne me connais pas. - Tu m'as nourri, Kobby.

translation.en: And if being a Marine is your dream…
translation.fr: Alors, si tu veux rejoindre la Marine…

translation.en: that's good enough for me.
So you plot a course to the next Marine base.
translation.fr: Bon, tu vas nous emmener à la base la plus proche.

translation.en: I get my map,
and you can join up. Yeah.
All right. Well, I'm gonna take that nap now.
translation.fr: Allez, je vais faire un roupillon.

translation.en: You can't just waltz into a Marine base and ask for a map to the Grand Line!
translation.fr: La Marine ne te laissera jamais prendre une carte de Grand Line !

translation.en: Don't worry.
I'm stealthy.
Yeah. Super stealthy.
There's someone in there. Let's get closer.
Help me!
Water…
Oh, you're in luck, sweetheart. We're all the help you'll need.
translation.fr: Vous avez de la chance, on va vous aider.

translation.en: My crew was attacked by pirates.
translation.fr: On a été attaqué par des pirates.

translation.en: I… I barely managed to make it out alive.
translation.fr: J'ai à peine réussi à leur échapper.

translation.en: Pirates, you say? I hear they're a terrible lot.
translation.fr: Des pirates ? C'est la lie de l'humanité.

translation.en: The worst sort. Good thing we found you instead of them.
translation.fr: Des mécréants. Heureusement qu'on en est pas.

translation.en: What you got there? Something to share?
translation.fr: Y a quoi, là-dedans ? Des objets de valeur ?

translation.en: No. Please, no, it's… it's all I have. Please.
translation.fr: Je vous en supplie. C'est tout ce qu'il me reste.

translation.en: It's a fair trade for saving your life.
translation.fr: C'est pas cher payé pour ta vie.

translation.en: Hey, what gives?
Sorry, boys. Thanks for the rescue.
I didn't know there were so many pirates!
translation.fr: Y a vraiment beaucoup de pirates.

translation.en: There are way worse pirates on the Grand Line.
translation.fr: Ceux de Grand Line sont bien pires.

translation.en: It's terrible.
Yeah. I know, right?
Where's my face?
Well, only one way I'm gonna get inside that base.
translation.fr: Je vois qu'une façon de pénétrer dans cette base.

translation.en: And it's not on an empty stomach.
translation.fr: Et j'y arriverai pas le ventre vide.

translation.en: Come on.
We already have our food.
translation.fr: On a ce qu'il nous faut.

translation.en: No, more is better. More is better. You gotta feed the brain.
translation.fr: Je le mangerai. Faut alimenter le cerveau.

translation.en: All right, so… I can't get inside the base through the gate,
translation.fr: Bon… Je peux pas entrer en passant par la porte de devant.

translation.en: but maybe… maybe… maybe what if I get inside flying?
translation.fr: Mais peut-être que… Et si je passais par les airs ?

translation.en: I can grab onto a bird or something.
translation.fr: Je pourrais m'agripper à un oiseau.

translation.en: That's a terrible idea.
Keep your voice down.
A bottle for me, and one for my friend. He's had a rough day.
translation.fr: Une bouteille pour moi et mon ami. Il en a bien besoin.

translation.en: Hi. Can I buy you a drink?
translation.fr: Salut, je peux t'offrir un verre ?

translation.en: Too tall.
You like rum?
Yeah, sure.
As much as the next guy.
I'm not asking the next guy.
- What's this? - Rice balls. For you.
translation.fr: - C'est quoi ? - Des boulettes de riz. Prenez.

translation.en: - You made them yourself? - Mm- hmm.
translation.fr: Elles sont pour moi ? C'est quoi, le marron ?

translation.en: - What's the brown stuff? - Chocolate. Makes everything taste better.
translation.fr: Elles sont pour moi ? C'est quoi, le marron ? - Du chocolat. Ça rend tout meilleur. - Rika ?

translation.en: Rika?
translation.fr: - Du chocolat. Ça rend tout meilleur. - Rika ?

translation.en: You stupid, stupid girl.
- Why don't you watch where you're going? - Rika, apologize to our guest.
translation.fr: - Regarde où tu vas. - Rika, excuse-toi.

translation.en: I'm… I'm so sorry.
I'm so sorry!
Next time, I won't be so nice.
translation.fr: La prochaine fois, tu le paieras.

translation.en: You dropped my food.
Delicious.
Now you eat one.
And apologize to the girl.
Do you know who I am?
A shithead Marine with a bad haircut.
I wouldn't do that.
Oh, come on, tough guy. Three swords?
I only need one.
- But it's gonna hurt. -
Good fighter.
You shouldn't draw your blade unless you're prepared to use it.
translation.fr: Si t'es pas prêt à tuer, sors pas ta lame.

translation.en: Don't kill me, please. My father will give you anything you want.
translation.fr: Pitié. Mon père te donnera tout ce que tu veux.

translation.en: Who's your father?
Captain Morgan.
He's in charge of the Marine base.
Then he owes me money.
I understand you sent four of my Marines to the infirmary.
translation.fr: T'as envoyé quatre de mes soldats à l'infirmerie.

translation.en: Without drawing a blade, I might add.
translation.fr: Sans dégainer ton sabre, qui plus est.

translation.en: Impressive.
I didn't want to make a mess.
translation.fr: Je voulais pas faire de taches.

translation.en: The Demon.
Most feared pirate hunter in the East Blue.
translation.fr: Le plus grand chasseur de pirates de tout East Blue.

translation.en: Hmm. I'd say you live up to your reputation.
If it's all the same, I'll just take my money and go.
translation.fr: Si ça te dérange pas, j'aimerais être payé.

translation.en: You'll collect your bounty,
but the penalty for assaulting a Marine is seven days strung up in the yard.
translation.fr: Mais le châtiment pour avoir attaqué un soldat est sept jours de croix.

translation.en: No food or water.
You can try to arrest me, but your brat'll be the first one I kill.
translation.fr: Si tu tentes de m'alpaguer, ton con de fils sera le premier à clamser.

translation.en: Hey! He can't speak to me that way!
I like you.
Oh, we should be working for the same team.
You'd make a hell of a Marine.
Kind of got my own thing going on.
Doesn't leave much time for playing dress- up.
translation.fr: Ça m'évite de devoir jouer aux zozos.

translation.en: It's a shame to lose a man of your talents,
translation.fr: Je détesterais perdre un homme de ton talent.

translation.en: since you won't be able to collect a bounty at any Marine base once I get the word out.
translation.fr: Mais je peux faire en sorte que tu ne puisses plus collecter de prime.

translation.en: So what's it gonna be?
A new career?
Or the yard?
Seven days?
I could catch up on my sleep.
I can't stop thinking about that fight.
translation.fr: J'arrête pas de repenser au bar.

translation.en: That guy was amazing.
And what's with the third sword?
I mean, where does it even go?
translation.fr: À ton avis, il va où ?

translation.en: No.
He had to protect that little girl from the Marines,
translation.fr: Il a protégé la petite fille des soldats.

translation.en: who were supposed to be protecting her.
translation.fr: Ce sont eux qui sont censés le faire.

translation.en: It doesn't make any sense.
If there are good pirates and bad pirates, then
translation.fr: S'il peut y avoir de bons pirates, alors…

translation.en: there are gonna be good Marines and bad Marines too.
translation.fr: il peut y avoir de mauvais soldats.

translation.en: You'll be one of the good ones.
Maybe Alvida was right.
I don't know anything about the world.
But you were her prisoner.
Yeah, but I knew who I was.
translation.fr: Oui, mais je savais qui j'étais.

translation.en: Now I have no idea.
I need to get into the base and find that map,
translation.fr: Il faut que j'aille chercher cette carte.

translation.en: and I could use some help.
You want me to help you steal from the Marines?
translation.fr: Tu veux que je t'aide à voler une carte ?

translation.en: No. Of course not.
How about you help me
get the boat ready?
You can handle that, right?
translation.fr: Ça, tu peux le faire, non ?

translation.en: I guess so.
What are you gonna do?
I'm working on that.
Beautiful morning, isn't it?
A bit hot for my taste though.
translation.fr: Un peu chaude à mon gout, ceci dit.

translation.en: The great Demon.
More like a misbehaving puppy tied up in the backyard.
translation.fr: Tu ressembles plus à un chien qu'on a puni.

translation.en: What do you say, puppy? Do you want to do a trick for me?
translation.fr: Alors, chienchien, tu veux un susucre ?

translation.en: Sit up and beg.
Put it down!
What's so special about this old thing? Hmm?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qu'il a de si spécial, ce sabre ?

translation.en: Enjoy these seven days,
'cause when I get down from here,
translation.fr: Quand je descendrai de cette croix,

translation.en: you'll be the one begging.
When you get down?
You think my father's gonna let you go?
translation.fr: Tu crois que mon père va te libérer ?

translation.en: You are going to die in this yard.
translation.fr: Tu vas crever sur cette croix.

translation.en: Hut. Hut. Hut. Hut. Hut. Hut!
Oh, hey. You're the guy from the bar.
- Get lost. - I am lost.
I'm trying to get inside the base.
Hey, I saw the way you fight. How did they even arrest you?
translation.fr: Je t'ai vu te battre. Comment ils ont fait pour t'arrêter ?

translation.en: They didn't.
I gave myself up.
Interesting choice.
I'm sure you had your reasons.
You don't know anything about me.
I know that you protected that little girl from those Marines last night.
translation.fr: Je sais que t'as pris la défense de cette gamine.

translation.en: You're a good guy.
I'm Roronoa Zoro, the pirate hunter.
translation.fr: Je suis Roronoa Zoro, le chasseur de pirates.

translation.en: Well, I'm Monkey D. Luffy,
translation.fr: Eh bien, moi, je suis Monkey D. Luffy,

translation.en: and I will be the King of the Pirates.
translation.fr: et je serai le roi des pirates.

translation.en: And I think you should join my crew.
What makes you think I'd wanna play pirates with you?
You're a great fighter.
I'd say that together, we'd make a pretty good team.
I kill your kind for a living.
translation.fr: Je tue des mecs comme toi.

translation.en: Pirate… hunter.
You keep saying that,
but is that all you are?
Is that all you want?
I made a promise to someone a long time ago…
translation.fr: J'ai promis quelque chose à quelqu'un. Y a bien longtemps.

translation.en: to become the world's greatest swordsman.
translation.fr: Que je deviendrai le plus grand sabreur du monde.

translation.en: Impressive.
You can untie me, but I'm still not gonna join your crew.
translation.fr: Détache-moi si tu veux, mais je t'aiderai pas.

translation.en: I mean it. I don't owe you anything.
translation.fr: Sérieusement, je rejoindrai pas ton équipage.

translation.en: I just think it's a waste of time for you to be hanging out here
translation.fr: Je peux pas te laisser moisir dans cette cour.

translation.en: when there's something you want out there.
Good luck on the sword thing.
Hey, can you close this behind me?
translation.fr: Dis, tu peux refermer cette grille derrière moi ?

translation.en: Thanks!
You're not supposed to be in here.
Captain Morgan sent me to find a map of The Grand Line ahead of his security briefing this afternoon.
translation.fr: Le colonel m'a demandé de lui apporter une carte de Grand Line.

translation.en: Why would he do that? All maps pertaining to The Grand Line
translation.fr: Pourquoi il ferait ça ? Toutes les cartes de Grand Line

translation.en: are kept under lock and key in his private office.
translation.fr: sont sous clé dans son bureau.

translation.en: I'm just following orders. But if you want to question Axe- Hand Morgan, be my guest.
translation.fr: Je fais que suivre ses ordres. Tu peux vérifier avec Morgan, si tu veux.

translation.en: Hey, we don't have any maps to The Grand Line down here, do we?
translation.fr: On a des cartes de Grand Line ?

translation.en: Nah, we didn't get any.
translation.fr: Non. On n'en a jamais eu.

translation.en: Hey, you're that girl from the bar.
The one who stole my uniform.
This is fine.
No problem.
Whoa! Hey, hey, hey! No, don't do that.
I'm taking you into custody for trespassing on a Marine base.
translation.fr: Je t'arrête. T'es entré par effraction.

translation.en: Better take yourself into custody too, 'cause you're not a Marine.
translation.fr: Alors, tu devrais aussi t'arrêter : t'es pas une soldate.

translation.en: Am too.  No, you're not.
translation.fr: - J'en suis une. - Non, tu mens.

translation.en: I heard everything.
You stole that guy's uniform. And now you're looking for my map.
translation.fr: T'as volé l'uniforme de ce type. Tu cherches ma carte.

translation.en: Your map? Yep. My map to The Grand Line.
translation.fr: - Ta carte ? - Oui, ma carte de Grand Line.

translation.en: It's my map, and I'm not leaving here without it.
translation.fr: C'est ma carte. Tu l'auras pas.

translation.en: Suit yourself.
Hey! Hey! Get back here!
Do you have any idea what you're doing?
translation.fr: Tu sais où tu vas, au moins ?

translation.en: Looking for that Morgan guy's office. Map's there, right?
translation.fr: Dans le bureau de ce Morgan. La carte y est, non ?

translation.en: That's your plan?
Just walk into Axe- Hand Morgan's office and ask him for the map?
translation.fr: Tu crois que Morgan le Hacheur va te donner la carte ?

translation.en: I may have to fight him for it. Why do they call him Axe- Hand anyways?
translation.fr: Je me battrai s'il le faut. Pourquoi tu l'appelles le Hacheur ?

translation.en: You are going to get us both caught if you keep stomping around this place.
translation.fr: Si tu continues à avancer comme ça, on va se faire pincer.

translation.en: We need a plan.
Axe- Hand!
Are you going to kill me?
Oh no. I've got something much worse in mind.
translation.fr: Non. J'ai quelque chose de bien pire en tête.

translation.en: Captain Morgan, sir, I was just escorting this prisoner to the brig.
translation.fr: Colonel, j'escortais ce prisonnier aux geôles de la base.

translation.en: He was arrested for causing a disturbance in the square.
translation.fr: Il a causé un esclandre en ville.

translation.en: Prisoner. I've never seen you before.
translation.fr: - Je suis son prisonnier. - Je ne t'ai jamais vue.

translation.en: I'm a transfer from the 77th, sir.
translation.fr: Je viens d'être transférée de la 77e, monsieur.

translation.en: What's your name, Private?
Nami, sir.
I put in a request to serve under your command.
translation.fr: Je voulais servir sous vos ordres.

translation.en: Wise choice.
I expect great things from you.
Yeah. She's the best!
I… I mean, she's the best of the worst.
translation.fr: Je veux dire… Elle a dépoté mon arrestation.

translation.en: I hate the Marines.
Carry on.
That was amazing. Admit it. We do make a pretty good team.
translation.fr: C'était dément. - On forme une super équipe. - On est pas une équipe.

translation.en: We are not a team.
translation.fr: - On forme une super équipe. - On est pas une équipe.

translation.en: Whatever you say.
Now all we have to do is figure out a way to get into Axe- Man's office.
translation.fr: Reste plus qu'à trouver le bureau du Bûcheron.

translation.en: Are those his keys?
How'd you do that?
I'm a thief.
You know, you're really good at thieving… and a good talker too.
translation.fr: Tu sais, t'es une bonne voleuse. Et une sacrée embobineuse.

translation.en: You should think about joining my pirate crew.
Let's get one thing straight. I am never joining anything with you.
translation.fr: Que ce soit clair : je rejoindrai jamais ton équipage.

translation.en: I hate pirates. Hate them!
translation.fr: Je hais les pirates. Je les hais !

translation.en: That's because you don't know me yet.
translation.fr: Tu dis ça parce que tu me connais pas.

translation.en: This guy really likes himself.
I'm going to find the map. Pretend you're not here.
translation.fr: Je vais chercher la carte. Et faire comme si t'étais pas là.

translation.en: But I am here.
Why do you want the map so badly anyway?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu la veux, cette carte ?

translation.en: I'm gonna use it to find the One Piece and become King of the Pirates.
translation.fr: Pour trouver le One Piece et devenir le roi des pirates.

translation.en: - Figures. - What?
Every idiot dreams of finding the One Piece.
translation.fr: Seuls les imbéciles rêvent de trouver le One Piece.

translation.en: People like you believe in something and you don't even know what it is.
translation.fr: Tu sais même pas en quoi tu crois.

translation.en: Well, yeah.
Don't you?
So why did you decide to become a thief?
I didn't decide. I needed to eat. You do what you have to, to survive.
translation.fr: J'ai fait ce que j'avais à faire. J'avais besoin de manger.

translation.en: You're right. Nothing more important than food.
translation.fr: T'as eu raison. Manger, y a pas plus important.

translation.en: Just find the map.
What's going on here?
Pirates, sir, inside the base. We're under attack!
translation.fr: Des pirates. Dans la base. Ils nous ont attaqué.

translation.en: What pirates?
A woman with orange hair, dressed like a Marine.
translation.fr: Une femme. Cheveux orange. Elle porte un uniforme de la Marine.

translation.en: She was trying to steal a map to The Grand Line.
translation.fr: Elle cherchait une carte de Grand Line.

translation.en: My keys! Sound the alarm.
Do you think they know we're here?
translation.fr: Tu crois que c'est pour nous ?

translation.en: No, I think they're after the other thief and idiot pirate trying to steal a map.
translation.fr: Non. C'est pour l'autre voleuse accompagnée d'un crétin de pirate.

translation.en: What are the odds of that?
Kidding.
But you might want to work a little faster.
Open up!
By the authority of the 153rd Marines!
translation.fr: Au nom de la 153e division de la Marine !

translation.en: You need to hurry. - I can't rush this! - Please hurry!
translation.fr: - Dépêche-toi. - Je fais ce que je peux !

translation.en: I have an idea.
- That's your idea? - Yeah.
How did you do that?
Aren't you that drunk from the bar?
translation.fr: T'es pas le poivrot du bar ?

translation.en: Glad I made an impression.
The imposter, the pirate hunter, and the prisoner.
translation.fr: L'imposteure, le chasseur de primes et le prisonnier.

translation.en: Fancy that. The three of you working together.
translation.fr: Qui l'aurait cru ? Vous travaillez ensemble.

translation.en: Yeah. We're a crew!
- Nope, not a crew. - Not together.
No enemy has ever escaped my wrath.
I alone defeated the Black Cat Pirates.
translation.fr: Moi seul ai vaincu l'équipage du Chat Noir.

translation.en: I alone captured Kuro of the Thousand Plans.
translation.fr: Moi seul ai tué Kuro le Machiavélique.

translation.en: And I alone keep Shells Town safe from the scum of the East Blue.
translation.fr: Et moi seul protège Shells Town de la vermine flottante d'East Blue.

translation.en: It's not only the axe. Every part of his body's a weapon.
translation.fr: Y a pas que la hache. Tout son corps est une arme.

translation.en: I'll go high. You go low.
translation.fr: Je vais passer en haut. Reste en bas.

translation.en: So that's where it goes.
Gum Gum Whip!
- Gum Gum Whip? - Yeah!
All the great fighters call out their finishing moves.
translation.fr: Tous les grands guerriers annoncent leurs attaques.

translation.en: No, they don't.
Hate to break up this beautiful moment, but we need to get this safe out of here.
translation.fr: Désolée de vous interrompre, mais faut qu'on embarque ce coffre.

translation.en: Maybe if we find some rope or something.
translation.fr: On pourrait peut-être se servir d'une corde.

translation.en: Or we can do that.
- Careful with that! - Whatever you say.
Oh, wait. I don't work for you.
translation.fr: Attends, non. Je bosse pas pour toi.

translation.en: I'm sensing a little bit of tension amongst the crew.
translation.fr: Je sens une tension au sein de l'équipage.

translation.en: - Not a crew! - Not a crew!
- I can't leave without my friend. - Can't wait. The Marines will be here.
translation.fr: - Faut qu'on attende mon ami. - Les soldats vont rappliquer.

translation.en: The Marines are here already. You're under arrest.
translation.fr: Ils sont déjà là. Je vous arrête.

translation.en: What's wrong with his hair?
Yeah, I might've done that.
I won't let you make a joke of me.
translation.fr: Arrêtez de vous moquer de moi !

translation.en: I'm taking you in and handing you over to my father.
translation.fr: Je vais vous livrer à mon père.

translation.en: I'll be the hero. I might even get a medal or something.
translation.fr: Je serai un héros. On me donnera probablement une médaille.

translation.en: - Koby? - God, that hurt!
It also felt really good too.
translation.fr: Mais ça m'a aussi fait un bien fou.

translation.en: No time to explain, but we gotta go. This whole island is trying to kill us.
translation.fr: Faut qu'on mette les voiles. On a toute l'ile à nos trousses.

translation.en: I'm not coming with you.
You sure?
Before we met, every choice was made for me.
translation.fr: J'ai passé des années à obéir à Alvida.

translation.en: But now I'm gonna do what I want to do.
I'm gonna be a Marine. I want to help people that can't help themselves.
translation.fr: Je vais m'engager. Je veux aider les plus faibles.

translation.en: Next time we meet, we might be enemies.
But for now…
we're friends.
This is Garp.
Pirates, you say?
Raiding our base in Shells Town.
What did they take?
Weapons? Gold?
Change of plan.
We're going to Shells Town.
Got a lead on Baroque Works?
We've been chasing those shadows a long time. This is different.
translation.fr: Je connais bien leurs procédés. Ceci est différent.

translation.en: A map to the Grand Line has been stolen…
translation.fr: Une carte de Grand Line a été volée.

translation.en: by a pirate in a straw hat.
translation.fr: Par un pirate portant un chapeau de paille.

translation.en: They were pirates, Captain, just like us.
translation.fr: C'étaient des pirates, capitaine. Comme nous.

translation.en: And they got the map.
And you didn't stop them.
translation.fr: Et tu ne les as pas arrêtés.

translation.en: I couldn't. I mean, there were three of them.
translation.fr: Je n'aurais pas pu, ils étaient trois.

translation.en: They must've been planning this for months.
translation.fr: Ils ont dû préparer le coup pendant des mois.

translation.en: Well, that's my map.
And I'm gonna get it back.
No matter who I have to kill.
translation.fr: Même si je dois les tuer.

translation.en: This is my first pirate score.
translation.fr: C'est mon premier acte de piraterie.

translation.en: From now on, it's all gonna be smooth sailing.
translation.fr: CETTE SAISON DANS ONE PIECE À partir de maintenant, ça va être le calme plat.

translation.en: This crew can handle anything.
translation.fr: Cet équipage peut faire face à tout.

translation.en: We've been making enemies everywhere we go.
Nothing can stop me from taking the East Blue.
translation.fr: Personne ne m'empêchera de conquérir East Blue.

translation.en: We've been captured. We need a plan.
translation.fr: On a été capturés. On a besoin d'un plan.

translation.en: That went pretty well.
Arlong will kill the entire village!
- Nami made her choice. - Ah!
We've got each other's backs… always.
translation.fr: On se serre les coudes. Quoi qu'il arrive.

translation.en: So these are the Straw Hat Pirates.
translation.fr: Voici donc les fameux Chapeaux de paille.
